Data visualisation is the process of presenting large amounts of information in ways that are simple to understand and interpret, as well as identifying patterns, trends, and correlations.

Data visualisation is a general term that describes any effort to help people understand the significance of data by placing it in a visual context. Data visualisation software can help expose and recognise patterns, trends, and correlations that may go undetected in text-based data.
